description: Expansion of 1/(1-3*x)^10; 10-fold convolution of A000244 (powers of 3).
comments: a(n)=A027465(n+10,10) (O. Gerard's triangle).With a different offset, number of n-permutations (n>=9) of 4 objects: u, v, z, x with repetition allowed, containing exactly nine (9) u's. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 02 2008
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
prog: (Sage)[lucas_number2(n, 3, 0)*binomial(n,9)/3^9 for n in xrange(9, 28)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 13 2009](MAGMA) [3^n*Binomial(n+9, 9): n in [0..30]]; // Vincenzo Librandi, Oct 15 2011
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
